translation.en: Are you excited for our trip?
For sure! For sure! For sure!
I can't wait to celebrate Día de los Muertos
I can't wait to meet Vida's grandfather
translation.zh: ‎我等不及要见到薇达的爷爷

translation.en: Are you sure you don't want to come with us?

translation.zh: ‎我也想去 但我不想错过万圣节

translation.en: but I don't want to miss Halloween. It's the...
translation.zh: ‎我也想去 但我不想错过万圣节 ‎这是…

‎-一年最棒的一晚
‎-一年最棒的一晚

translation.en: but so is Día de los Muertos!
Oh, I wish there was a way we could all be in both places at once.
translation.zh:
‎真希望有个方法
‎能让我们同时出现在两个地方

translation.en: Me too! Katya, don't you have a spell we could use?
translation.zh:
‎我也是 卡蒂亚
‎你有我们能使用的咒语吗？

translation.en: Sometimes it's so hard to choose what to do.
It is, but it wouldn't be Halloween without vampires and witches.
translation.zh:
‎就是说啊 但没有吸血鬼和女巫
‎就不算是万圣节了

translation.en: [sighs] Oh, Vida! I still haven't figured out the ending for our dance.
translation.zh:
‎薇达 我还没想出
‎我们的舞蹈该如何结尾

translation.en: Oh, it's OK. I know you'll get it.
translation.zh: ‎没关系 我知道你会想到的

translation.en: I just want our dance to be really good...
translation.zh: ‎我只希望我们的舞蹈真的很厉害

translation.en: [chuckles] Don't worry, Albert, it will be.
translation.zh: ‎别担心 亚伯特 一定会的

translation.en: Is that your dance for the Día de los Muertos parade?
translation.zh:
‎那是你们为亡灵节游行
‎准备的舞蹈吗？

translation.en: Me too! And I can't wait to visit my hometown
translation.zh:
‎-我好爱游行
‎-我也是 ‎我等不及去拜访我的家乡

translation.en: and celebrate the holiday with all my friends.
translation.zh: ‎跟我所有的朋友庆祝这个节日

‎-萌怪变身 超能小萌怪！
‎-萌怪变身 超能小萌怪！

translation.en: Oh, I love it when you do that!
Who's ready to go to Ciudad Monstruo?
What are you waiting for? Hop in!
Hey, Vida! Don't forget to bring us something from your hometown!
translation.zh:
‎薇达 别忘了从你的家乡
‎带点伴手礼给我们
‎好啊 我一定会的 再见

translation.en: Everyone, this is my abuelo: Papá José.
translation.zh: ‎各位 这是我的爷爷 荷塞爷爷
‎爷爷 这些是我的朋友们

translation.en: I almost didn't recognize you. You've grown.
translation.zh: ‎我都快不认得你了 你长大了

translation.en: [chuckles] Did you hear that? I've grown!
Vida has told me all about you.
translation.zh: ‎薇达跟我说了所有关于你的事

translation.en: Gracias for bringing everyone here safely.
translation.zh: ‎谢谢你把大家安全地载到这里

translation.en: Vida, why don't you show your friends around?
translation.zh:
‎薇达 你何不带朋友们
‎去四处转转呢？

translation.en: I wonder where Vida's friends are. I want to meet them!
translation.zh:
‎不知道薇达的朋友们在哪里
‎我想见见他们

translation.en: I'm sure they must be around here somewhere...

translation.zh: ‎我跟纳丘、佩皮塔、弗威戈还有洁姬

translation.en: Fuego, Jackie and I had so many fun adventures here!
translation.zh: ‎我跟纳丘、佩皮塔、弗威戈还有洁姬 ‎在这里经历了好多有趣的冒险

translation.en: And because everything is protected by Calavera Magic,
translation.zh: ‎因为一切都受到卡拉维拉魔法的保护

translation.en: we're always safe no matter where we go.
translation.zh: ‎无论我们去到哪里都是安全的

translation.en: Will we get to meet your friends while we're here?
translation.zh: ‎我们在这里时 能见到你的朋友吗？

translation.en: I hope so! I'm sure they're around here somewhere...
translation.zh: ‎希望如此 他们应该就在这里某处

translation.en: Come on! I'll show you our float for the parade!
translation.zh: ‎走吧 我让你们看看我们游行花车

translation.en: That's our Día de los Muertos parade float?
translation.zh: ‎那是我们的亡灵节游行花车？

translation.en: but first we need to decorate it.
translation.zh: ‎但首先 我们必须装饰一下

translation.en: Papel picado banners are a great way to celebrate any holiday.
translation.zh: ‎七彩剪纸旗帜是欢庆节日的好方法

translation.en: I'm in charge of the sugar skull balloons!
because flowers and sugar skulls are an important part
translation.zh: ‎因为花朵和糖骷髅是我们庆祝亡灵节

translation.en: of how we celebrate Día de los Muertos.
And I'll add the twinkle lights, because... um...
translation.zh: ‎而我会加点小灯泡 因为…
‎因为大家都爱小灯泡 对吧？

‎-是啊 确实是这样 弗兰奇
‎-真的

translation.en: I'm going to work on the ending to the dance.
Great, we all have a job to do.
translation.zh: ‎很好 我们都有事情要忙

translation.en: Well... what are we waiting for?
♪ That is the way we get things done ♪
♪ We're Super Monsters Here we come ♪
translation.zh: ‎我们是小萌怪 我们来了

translation.en: ♪ We work and play That's how we get things done ♪
translation.zh:
‎寓工作于娱乐
‎这就是我们的做事方法

translation.en: I still don't know what to do for the ending.
translation.zh: ‎我还是不知道结尾该怎么跳

translation.en: And I know you'll come up with something fabuloso!
translation.zh: ‎我知道你会想出绝妙的点子

translation.en: Don't worry. This sort of thing happens all the time.
translation.zh: ‎别担心 这种事是家常便饭

translation.en: That's the perfect move to end our dance!
translation.zh: ‎这就是我们舞蹈的完美结尾

translation.en: Huh? Wait! Show me how you did that!
translation.zh: ‎等等 让我看看你是怎么跳的

translation.en: I am! And who are you?
You're a short one, aren't you?
So, Alberto, what's the word? What are you doing out here?
translation.zh:
‎所以亚伯特托 怎么回事？
‎你为何在外头晃？

translation.en: I'm looking for a magical creature
Uh... not quite what I was looking for...
I can't dance, but I know exactly who you're looking for.
translation.zh:
‎我不会跳舞
‎但我很清楚你在找的是谁

translation.en: That girl's got some serious moves.
translation.zh: ‎那女孩会跳一些很厉害的舞步

translation.en: We'll be able to get a better look from up there.
Yep, there she is. That way!
translation.zh: ‎是 她在那里 往那里走

translation.en: Come on, jump! I'll catch you!
translation.zh: ‎来吧 快跳 我会接住你的
‎我就说吧 孩子 我超级强壮

translation.en: Pepita! Seriously, you've got to work on those brakes.
translation.zh: ‎佩皮塔 说真的 你得把刹车练好

translation.en: Flying's the easy part. It's the sudden stops I have trouble with.
translation.zh: ‎飞行很容易 急停对我来说才是难事

translation.en: So... who are you? I'm Albert.
Or you can call me Alberto.
translation.zh: ‎或着你也可以叫我亚伯特托
‎亚伯特托？幸会 嗨 你好

translation.en: I'm Pepita! Want to be my friend?
translation.zh: ‎我叫佩皮塔 ‎想当我的朋友吗？我们做朋友吧

translation.en: I'll be your friend. Let's be friends!
translation.zh: ‎想当我的朋友吗？我们做朋友吧

translation.en: Nacho, I have a new friend, but you'll always be my friend too.
translation.zh:
‎纳丘 我交了一个新朋友
‎但你也永远都会是我的朋友

translation.en: Alberto here is looking for an amazing dancer he was following.
translation.zh: ‎亚伯特托正在找一位很优秀的舞者

translation.en: I need her to help me with the ending of my dance.
translation.zh: ‎我需要她帮我编出舞蹈的结尾

translation.en: I told him we can help him find her.
translation.zh: ‎我跟他说 我可以帮他找到她

translation.en: Oh, absolutely! I'll help you find her. I want to find her.
translation.zh: ‎我当然可以帮你找到她 我想找到她

translation.en: Do you wanna go find her? Let's go find her!
translation.zh: ‎你想找到她吗？我们去找她吧

translation.en: But first, I just have one question.
Do you know how to ride a flying burro?
I should probably warn you. She likes to do tricks.
translation.zh: ‎我应该警告你 她喜欢耍特技

translation.en: What do you mean, she likes to do-- [shouts]
[giggles] I know! I keep telling people that.
translation.zh: ‎我知道 我也一直跟别人这么说

translation.en: Do you see her? Where is she?
Wait, are those sparkles over there?
And you know what that means?
Whoa! I told you, I'm great at flying!
translation.zh:
‎-天啊
‎-我就说吧 我飞行技巧很厉害

translation.en: Just not so good on the landing. [chuckles]
-[Zoe] Yes! It's amazing! -[Lobo] Yes, it's so good!
It will be the best float at the parade.
translation.zh: ‎这会是游行车队里最棒的花车

translation.en: Everyone is going to love the dance we do on it.
translation.zh: ‎大家都会很爱我们在上面跳的舞蹈

translation.en: Albert, how are you doing with the ending dance moves?
translation.zh: ‎亚伯特 你想好结尾的舞步了吗？

translation.en: Oh, no! He must have wandered off!
translation.zh: ‎不好了 他一定是走丢了

translation.en: Even though it's a large area, this land is very safe.
translation.zh:
‎即便这里幅员辽阔
‎但这个地方非常安全

translation.en: And never forget: our land has Calavera Magic.
translation.zh:
‎永远别忘了
‎我们的土地有卡拉维拉魔法庇护

translation.en: I know Albert is safe, but we still have to find him.
translation.zh:
‎我知道亚伯特不会有危险
‎但我们还是必须找到他

translation.en: The parade is soon, and he's in charge of the dance.
translation.zh:
‎游行很快就要开始了
‎他是负责舞蹈的人

translation.en: We should probably help, right? They will be fine.
translation.zh:
‎-我们应该帮忙他们 是不是？
‎-他们没问题的

translation.en: There he is! The Sky Guy!
Dude, I was doing the intro!
translation.zh: ‎老兄 说好是我负责介绍的

translation.en: Oh, yeah, we're buds. We hang out.
translation.zh: ‎是啊 我们是好友 常一起玩

translation.en: [Pepita] Hey, Fuego! Next time give us a little warning before you land!
translation.zh:
‎弗威戈 下次你要降落时
‎先通知我们一声

translation.en: No, where's the fun in that?
And what brings you out here, young Alberto?
translation.zh: ‎你怎么会来这里 小亚伯特托？

translation.en: She was dancing, am I right?
And she was the most amazing, most incredible dancer I've ever seen!
translation.zh:
‎她是我看过最厉害
‎最不可思议的舞者

translation.en: Well, when we find her, you be sure to tell her how good she is.
translation.zh:
‎等我们找到她后
‎你一定要告诉她 她有多厉害

translation.en: So you'll help me find her?
Just so you know, he's not as much fun as me! He doesn't like to do tricks.
translation.zh:
‎跟你说一声 他不像我那么有趣
‎他不喜欢耍特技

translation.en: Pepita's right. I don't do tricks.
translation.zh: ‎佩皮塔说得对 我不耍特技

translation.en: Who needs tricks when you can fly as high as I can?
translation.zh:
‎如果能像我飞得那么高
‎谁还需要特技？

translation.en: Hang on and I'll show you!
translation.zh: ‎抓紧了 我让你见识一下

translation.en: I'm not sure I can see her from way up here!
translation.zh: ‎我不确定在这么高的地方还能看到她

translation.en: Yeah, I think I found something.
That way! I saw some sparkles!
translation.zh: ‎那边 我看到了一些闪光

translation.en: Were they gold and purple with little bits of green
that look like pickle jelly candies?
I know those sparkles! Come on, let's go!
translation.zh: ‎我认得那些闪光 跟我来吧

translation.en: ♪ We're on our way to find our friend ♪
♪ To help me learn to groove today ♪
♪ Having fun every step of the way ♪
♪ Getting ready for show time Vamos ♪
♪ We're following footsteps Having a super monstery time ♪
translation.zh: ‎走吧 我们跟着脚步前进 ‎小萌怪一起快乐出发

translation.en: ♪ When we find our friend We'll be so glad! ♪
translation.zh: ‎找到朋友 心花就会朵朵开

translation.en: ♪ When new friends become old friends ♪
♪ We're by your step Let's follow along ♪
translation.zh: ‎方向正确 跟着走准没错

translation.en: ♪ When friends come together We can't go wrong ♪
translation.zh: ‎当朋友聚首 就不会出错

translation.en: ♪ New and old Old and new ♪
That's the dance move I was telling you about!
These are my friends I was telling you about!
And I'm the one everyone is always talking about.
I'm so happy to see you all again!
And we're happy to see you!
I missed you! Did you miss me?
Of course, you missed me! How could you not miss me?
translation.zh: ‎你当然会想我了 怎么可能不会？

translation.en: [giggles] Oh, Pepita! I missed all of you!
translation.zh: ‎佩皮塔 我想念你们每一个人
‎各位 他们分别是弗威戈

translation.en: You've met Albert. And this is Frankie.
translation.zh: ‎你们都见过亚伯特了 这位是弗兰奇

translation.en: [giggles] Finally my new friends get to meet my old friends!
translation.zh:
‎我的新朋友
‎终于可以见到我的老朋友了

translation.en: It really took you long enough.
I mean, I did leave you a trail of sparkles to follow!
translation.zh:
‎我可是在一整条路上留下了闪光
‎让你可以跟着走

translation.en: But you were so fast, it was hard to catch up with you.
translation.zh: ‎但你走得太快了 我很难跟得上你

translation.en: Do you think you can show me how you do that big dance move?
I'm a jackalope. What am I gonna do with money?
translation.zh: ‎我是一只鹿角兔 我拿钱能做什么？

translation.en: Of course I'll show you how to do my dance!
translation.zh: ‎我当然会教你怎么跳我的舞步

translation.en: But we better hurry, the parade is going to start soon!
translation.zh:
‎但我们得动作快
‎游行马上就要开始了

translation.en: [Vida] Albert's right! And we still have a lot to do.
translation.zh:
‎亚伯特说得对
‎我们还有很多事没做呢

translation.en: ♪ When we're together Everything is better ♪
translation.zh: ‎只要我们在一起 一切就会变得有趣

translation.en: ♪ Check out our dance moves! Our dance moves are amazing ♪
translation.zh: ‎看看我们的舞步 多么令人惊奇

translation.en: ♪ We love laughing and singing And the joy the parade is bringing ♪
translation.zh: ‎我们喜欢大笑和唱歌 ‎游行让我们好欢乐

translation.en: ♪ When we're together Everything is better ♪
translation.zh: ‎只要我们在一起 一切就会变得有趣

translation.en: Lo siento, everyone. I have some bad news.
translation.zh: ‎抱歉 各位 我有些坏消息

translation.en: The tractor that was supposed to pull the float, it won't start.
translation.zh:
‎拖拉机要负责拉动花车
‎但它现在无法发动

translation.en: But how can we dance in the parade if we don't have the float?
translation.zh:
‎若没有花车
‎我们在游行时该怎么跳舞？

translation.en: I don't know what we can do.
♪ It's been, oh, oh, oh So long, oh, oh, oh ♪
♪ But now we are together again ♪
♪ Sí, cariño It's been a while ♪
translation.zh: ‎没错 亲爱的 好久不见

translation.en: ♪ So we honor all the monsters That came before ♪
♪ Ay, qué bueno verte de nuevo ♪
♪ It's the day that we celebrate ♪
♪ El Día de los Muertos El Día de los Muertos ♪
Alberto! Get ready to catch me!
translation.zh: ‎亚伯特托 准备好接住我吧

translation.en: Uh... that's not a good idea!
Hey, I caught you, now you catch me!
translation.zh: ‎嘿 我之前接住了你 现在换你接住我

translation.en: [giggles] Bet you didn't see that coming!
♪ It's the day that we celebrate ♪
♪ El Día de los Muertos El Día de los Muertos ♪
Are you ready to help us with the ending?
translation.zh: ‎你准备好来帮忙跳结尾了吗？

translation.en: ♪ So we honor all the monsters That came before ♪
♪ Fue tan bueno verte de nuevo ♪
♪ It's the day that we celebrate ♪
♪ El Día de los Muertos El Día de los Muertos ♪
Vida! You and your friends have made
this Día de los Muertos celebration so special.
translation.zh: ‎让今年的亡灵节庆祝活动变得很特别
‎非常谢谢你为我们做的一切

translation.en: [Vida] And I'm going to miss you.
Wait, what about your animal friends?
translation.zh: ‎等等 你那些动物朋友呢？

translation.en: Yeah, we didn't get a chance to say goodbye.
translation.zh: ‎是啊 我们还没来得及道别呢

translation.en: I'll say goodbye to all los animales for you.
translation.zh: ‎我会替你们跟那些动物们道别的

‎-你会跟纳丘说吗？
‎-我一定会去跟他说的

translation.en: Do you think we'll ever see them again?
translation.zh: ‎你觉得我们还能再见到他们吗？

translation.en: Oh, I have a feeling we will.
Hasta luego. Come back again soon!
translation.zh: ‎再见 要快点回来看我们

translation.en: How was Día de los Muertos?
We even saved a little something for you!
translation.zh: ‎我们还留了一些东西给你们

translation.en: Did you bring us something back from Ciudad Monstruo?
translation.zh:
‎你们给我们从怪物之城
‎带伴手礼回来了吗？
‎是的 我们准备了 你看

‎-这是我们的朋友！
‎-这是我们的朋友！

translation.en: Wow! You really brought back something special, Vida.
translation.zh: ‎你带了好特别的东西回来 薇达

translation.en: [chuckles] And that's not all we brought back.
Oh! What else did you bring?
[chuckles] We brought back a new dance!
♪ La la la la la la Super Monsters ♪
♪ We're Super Monsters We're human in the daylight ♪
translation.zh: ‎我们小萌怪 白天是普通小孩

translation.en: ♪ We're Super Monsters We become monsters at night ♪
translation.zh: ‎我们小萌怪 到夜晚就大变身

translation.en: ♪ In Pitchfork Pines we learn And help each other grow ♪
translation.zh: ‎在幼儿园成长 我们互相帮助

translation.en: ♪ There's magic in twilight That's when we start to glow ♪
translation.zh: ‎借着暮光魔法 我们开始闪亮

‎-德拉克飞得超快
‎-克里奥旋风

translation.en: ♪ Cleo, wind power Spike, dragon clouds ♪
translation.zh:
‎-德拉克飞得超快
‎-克里奥旋风 ‎-史派克吹云朵
‎-难逃柔依法眼

translation.en: ♪ Zoe, zombie vision Lobo, super speed ♪
translation.zh:
‎-史派克吹云朵
‎-难逃柔依法眼 ‎-洛博飞毛腿
‎-神奇卡蒂亚

‎-洛博飞毛腿
‎-神奇卡蒂亚 ‎-弗兰奇 跺
‎-超能小萌怪

translation.en: ♪ Monsters! Until next time we monster up! ♪
translation.zh:
‎-超能小萌怪
‎-小萌怪 ‎期待下次变身时刻
